item.description:
Join Members and Guests of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group and South Shore Walkabouts for a New Year's Eve Eve Appetizer Social Celebration at a restaurant we dined at for an Appetizer Social nearly 2 years ago: Bugaboo Creek.  When we dined here in April 2009 we sampled every appetizer on the menu and had a fun evening.  Tonight we will have both Appetizers and some Desserts.  Bugaboo Creek has delicious appetizers, desserts, bread and great drinks, including their own custom Moose Juice.  This is a favorite restaurant among steakhouse and family restaurant lovers in the area. 

 

Soups and Salads range from $4-$12 and Entrees range from $12-$25.   You can learn more about our prior adventure here by clicking on the following link.  www.meetup.com/ssdomg/events/9989102

 

But, don't take our word for it.  Check it out yourself.  Come on out for a Friday Night New Year's Eve Eve Appetizer Social Celebration! 

 

Do you have a food allergy or need to eat gluten-free?  Please email Angela directly as the restaurant is sending her the allergen listings and Bugaboo Creek does have a gluten-free menu.  Please do this no later than Wednesday, December 28th.

 

Here's how it will work tonight. 

*Everyone will pay one flat price upon arrival which will cover all of the appetizers and desserts.  (Between $14-$18, TBD on December 26th based on the number of Yes RSVPs.  We will update this with an exact cost no later than December 28th.) 

*Individuals will pay for their own beverages and anything you choose to order off the menu. 

*Members of both Groups will not pay an Event Fee. 

*2011 Annual Members of SSDOMG may bring one Guest for free (no Event Fee). All other Guests will pay an Event Fee. 

*This event will run from 6:30-9pm.  Arrive anytime.  Please let us know if you will be arriving after 7:30pm so we can plan the food accordingly.

*If you belong to both SSDOMG and Walkabouts, please RSVP on only one site: not both!  This will help us keep our count and cost accurate. 

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Friday Night New Year's Eve Eve Appetizer Social Celebration

Friday, December 30th @ 6:30pm - 9pm

Bugaboo Creek

551 John Mahar Highway

Braintree, MA 02184

781-848-0002

  

Meeting Place: Please meet in the section of the dining room to the left of the bar/lounge area.

Organizers: Angela & Mike

Cost: $14-$18pp - Final Cost TBD on Monday, December 26th based on the number of Yes RSVPs.

Event Fee: 2011 Annual Members & 1st Guest - FREE, Members - FREE; Other Guests - $2 each; $6 or $8 to become a 2012 Annual Member (see below)

2012 Annual Membership Special: Join as an Annual Member for 2012 before the end of 2011 and save! Through the end of this year, 2012 Annual Memberships are $6.00 for Current and Past Annual Members and $8.00 for all other Group Members.

Min/Max: Minimum of 10 total Yes RSVPs by Friday, December 23rd.  No maximum at this time.  Maximum as of 8pm on Thursday, December 29th: 20.

Guests: 2 per member; Please contact an Event Organizer for exceptions.

RSVP Deadline: 8pm on Thursday, December 29th! Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer prior to the event.  No RSVPs will be allowed after this time as the restaurant needs a final count on Thursday night.

Please bring cash! You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.  Paying for our meals with cash has been an SSDOMG policy for over 5 years now.  This helps simplify the bill paying.  (Note: Tonight, you can pay your individual tab with your credit card.  Cash is still required for the Appetizer portion of the evening.)

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions: 

Overview: Located behind Shaw's in Pearl Plaza, it's a straight 8-10 minutes walk from the Braintree T and about 2 miles from Exit 17 off Route 3.

From Route 3: Take Exit 17/Union Street Braintree.  Exit the Rotary heading towards the T station and get in one of the 2 left lanes.  Take a left at the first light to the T is now on your right.  You will go straight through the next 2 sets of lights passing by Pearl Street on your right.  After you round the bed after the 2nd set of lights the entrance to the parking lot will be on your right across from the Jonathan's Landing Condominium Complex.  (If you go over the RR track you have gone too far.)  Pull in, take a left and head towards the restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the section of the dining room to the left of the bar/lounge area.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Friday Night New Year's Eve Eve Appetizer Social Celebration
